title: Could Terraform Return to Open Source Under IBM’s Ownership?
author: B Cameron Gain
description: IBM's HashiCorp acquisition harkens back to the era when the company's stance shifted away from its previous model of largely proprietary offerings and services to open source.
cntitle: Terraform 能否在 IBM 的所有权下回归开源？
cndescription: IBM 收购 HashiCorp 让大家回想起公司立场从很大程度上专有产品和服务转向开源的时代。
